channel.title: Priority Queue on Interview
channel.description: Recent content in Priority Queue on Interview

item.title: 1642. Furthest Building you Can Reach
item.description: Description # You are given an integer array heights representing the heights of buildings, some bricks, and some ladders. You start your journey from building 0 and move to the next building by possibly using bricks or ladders. While moving from building i to building i+1 (0-indexed), If the current building’s height is greater than or equal to the next building’s height, you do not need a ladder or bricks.
